Package edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager

Class TrailManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager.TrailManager
public class TrailManager extends Object
A class that maintains trail and landmark information within the TrailManager system. TrailManager contains functionality for getting distances to all landmarks from an origin landmark, searching landmarks by ID, and getting a list of proposed first aid locations by searching for landmarks with an intersecting trail threshold.
Author:
Thommasaht Nhouyvanisvong (tcnhouyv)

      public TrailManager(String pathToLandmarkFile, String pathToTrailFile, edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.dsa.DataStructure mapType) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a TrailManager from input files containing landmarks and trails. Allows for custom selection of a map type.
      Parameters:
      pathToLandmarkFile - name of landmark file
      pathToTrailFile - name of trail file
      mapType - type of map to be used
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if either file is invalid

  • Method Details

    • getDistancesToDestinations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,Integer> getDistancesToDestinations(String originLandmark)
      This method traverses all trails that intersect with originLandmark, adding landmarks not currently in the map to return a map containing all landmarks reachable from originLandmark and their distances from originLandmark.
      Parameters:
      originLandmark - landmark to determine reachable landmarks
      Returns:
      map containing reachable landmarks and their distances

    • getLandmarkByID

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark getLandmarkByID(String landmarkID)
      Returns the Landmark corresponding with the specified landmark ID.
      Parameters:
      landmarkID - landmark ID to search
      Returns:
      landmark containing landmarkID

    • getProposedFirstAidLocations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Trail>> getProposedFirstAidLocations(int numberOfIntersectingTrails)
      Returns a map of landmarks and list of trails with a number of intersecting trails >= the parameter. If no landmarks contain the specified number of trails, an empty map is returned.
      Parameters:
      numberOfIntersectingTrails - number of intersecting trails a landmark must contain
      Returns:
      map containing Landmarks with at least numberOfIntersectingTrails
